name: Oilmania
overview: Is it an Easy peasy Anteater/Aardvark clone or it it an Oil's Well clone? Created by Christian Scholz and published in Golden Disk 64 1991/07. Are you smart enough to be at least as successful as J.R.? Or do you prefer to trust your own nose when it comes to the oil business? There are many dangers in oil production; Above all, make sure you get to the destination quickly and safely.
